# Ex03 Places Around Me
# Date:
# AIM
To develop a website to display details about the places around my house.

# DESIGN STEPS
## STEP 1
Create a Django admin interface.

## STEP 2
Download your city map from Google.

## STEP 3
Using <map> tag name the map.

## STEP 4
Create clickable regions in the image using <area> tag.

## STEP 5
Write HTML programs for all the regions identified.

## STEP 6
Execute the programs and publish them.

# CODE
imagemap.html
```
<html>
<head>
    <title>image map</title>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Image Map Generated by http://www.image-map.net/ -->
<img src="Screenshot 2026-02-03 110131.png" usemap="#image-map">

<map name="image-map">
    <area target="" alt="KG Cinemas" title="KG Cinemas" href="kg.html" coords="679,701,750,601" shape="rect">
    <area target="" alt="Race Course" title="Race Course" href="Racecourse.html" coords="1430,489,558" shape="circle">
    <area target="" alt="District Court" title="District Court" href="Court.html" coords="366,599,534,840,66,769" shape="rect">
</map>
</body>    
</html>
```
kg.html
```
<html>
    <head>KG Cinemas</head><body ng="cyan">
        <dl>
        <dt align="centre">KG Cinemas</dt>
        <dd>
            KG Cinemas in Coimbatore is a historic, four-screen multiplex established in 1981, offering a long-standing, popular movie-watching experience. Known for its large seating capacity, the venue was recently renovated and rebranded as KG Multiverse in 2025, featuring upgraded,, plush seating, advanced projection, and Dolby Atmos sound for an immersive experience.
        </dd>
        </dl>
    </body>
</html>
```
Racecourse.html
```
<html>
    <head>Racecourse</head><body ng="cyan">
        <dl>
        <dt align="centre">Racecourse</dt>
        <dd>
            Race Course in Coimbatore is a premier, upscale locality and popular recreational hub, originally developed in 1815 as a British horse racing track. Located centrally between Avinashi and Trichy Roads, it features a 2.25 km, tree-lined walking and jogging track, making it a favorite spot for fitness enthusiasts and families.
        </dd>
        </dl>
    </body>
</html>
```
Court.html
```
<html>
    <head>Court</head><body ng="cyan">
        <dl>
        <dt align="centre">Court</dt>
        <dd>
            The Principal District Court in Coimbatore is located in a Combined Court Complex on Arts College Road, Gopalapuram, Coimbatore (641018), operating from 10 AM to 5 PM, Monday through Saturday. As the primary local judiciary, it handles civil and criminal cases within the district, featuring accessibility options like wheelchair-accessible entrances and parking.
        </dd>
        </dl>
    </body>
</html>
```

The program for implementing image maps using HTML is executed successfully.
